text: 18:21 Josua 24:15; Matyu 6:24Ezɨ Elaija ghua gumazamizibar boroghɨn tughav ikia, kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir pumuning itiba, ia manadɨzoghɨn nɨghnɨzir vamɨra ikiam? Egh Ikiavɨra Itir God, a guizbangɨra God, ia anarɨra an ziam fam. Eghtɨ Bal a guizbangɨra God, ia anarɨra an ziam fam.” Ezɨ gumazamiziba tong akatam ikarazir puvatɨ. Bar puvatɨ.
